A

a - Variable in class DataBaseApp
(reference) Creates an instance of and points to the AddressBook class.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class AddressBook
This method determines what to do based on the button that was pressed.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class DataBaseApp
Determines what to do based on the menu item selected by the user.
AddressBook - Class in <Unnamed>
This program allows users to store up to 50 records with information on a person's full name, phone and email and view them.
AddressBook() - Constructor for class AddressBook
Class constructor calls the askData method to add all components on the screen when the object is created.
askData() - Method in class AddressBook
This method sets the layout into a grid and creates JLabels, and adds these labels as well as text fields to the panel.

C

changed - Variable in class AddressBook
(boolean) Whether or not the user has made a change.
currentRecord - Static variable in class AddressBook
(static integer) Represents the record the user is on/viewing.

D

DataBaseApp - Class in <Unnamed>
This class allows the user to save, open, and create files and creates menu bar with these options.
DataBaseApp() - Constructor for class DataBaseApp
Class constructor that calls the parent constructor, creates an instance of AddressBook, adds the panel and creates and adds menu items, a menu and the menubar.
DataCheck - Class in <Unnamed>
This program checks to see if the user entered valid phone numbers and emails.
DataCheck() - Constructor for class DataCheck
 
displayData() - Method in class AddressBook
Displays the data from PersonRecord in the appropriate text fields.

E

emailField - Variable in class AddressBook
(reference) The field where the email is inputted.

F

file(String) - Method in class DataBaseApp
This method handles saving and opening files, and the JFileChooser.
fileName - Variable in class DataBaseApp
(reference) The file to be specified by the user.
firstNameField - Variable in class AddressBook
(reference) The field where the first name is inputted.

G

getEmail() - Method in class PersonRecord
Returns the person's email.
getFirstName() - Method in class PersonRecord
Returns the person's first name.
getLastName() - Method in class PersonRecord
Returns the person's last name.
getPhone() - Method in class PersonRecord
Returns the person's phone number.

I

isEmail(String) - Static method in class DataCheck
This method checks to see if the email entered is an email, returning a verdict.
isPhone(String) - Static method in class DataCheck
This method checks to see if the phone number was entered correctly, composing of 10 digits, returning a verdict.

L

lastNameField - Variable in class AddressBook
(reference) The field where the last name is inputted.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class DataBaseApp
The main method creates an instance of this class and controls program flow.
MAX_RECORD - Variable in class AddressBook
(Final integer) The maximum number of records that can be stored.

N

newDataBase() - Method in class DataBaseApp
This method creates a new data base.

P

PersonRecord - Class in <Unnamed>
This program stores data about a person's full name, phone and email and can access and change the data.
PersonRecord(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class PersonRecord
This constructor allows a PersonRecord to be created with data about the person's name, phone and email to be sent in to the class.
PersonRecord(String, String) - Constructor for class PersonRecord
This constructor allows a PersonRecord to be created with data about the person's full name to be sent in.
PersonRecord(String, String, String) - Constructor for class PersonRecord
This constructor allows a PersonRecord to be created with data about the person's full name and email to be sent in.
PersonRecord() - Constructor for class PersonRecord
This constructor allows a PersonRecord to be created with no information.
PersonRecord(String) - Constructor for class PersonRecord
This constructor allows a PersonRecord to be created with data about the person's first name to be sent in.
persons - Variable in class AddressBook
(object array) An array of records that are each capable of storing a person's first and last name, phone and email, with maximum 50.
phoneField - Variable in class AddressBook
(reference) The field where the phone number is inputted.

R

recordField - Variable in class AddressBook
(reference) The field where current and total records is displayed.

S

setEmail(String) - Method in class PersonRecord
Allows the email to be changed.
setFirst(String) - Method in class PersonRecord
Allows the first name to be changed.
setLast(String) - Method in class PersonRecord
Allows the last name to be changed.
setPhone(String) - Method in class PersonRecord
Allows the phone number to be changed.
storeData() - Method in class AddressBook
Stores data from each field into the current element of the persons array.

T

totalRecords - Static variable in class PersonRecord
The total number of records that have been submitted.
